TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteValueExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 检索与路由页中的指定 URL 参数对应的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value that corresponds to a specified URL parameter in a routed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，使它可以使用标记来将服务器控件的属性设置为一个路由页中的 URL 参数的值。The class makes it possible to use markup to set the property of a server control to the value of one of the URL parameters in a routed page. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用标记来显示 URL 参数的值`searchterm`。The following example shows how to use markup to display the value of the URL parameter `searchterm`. 使用定义路由`http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}`与 URL 模式。The route is defined by using `http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}` as the URL pattern. ``` ``` 如果替换的 URL 请求该页`http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles`、控件将显示"自行车"。If the page is requested with the URL `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles`, the control displays "Bicycles".

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用此方法时形式的表达式`<%$ RouteValue:urlparameter %>`时遇到的非编译页。ASP.NET calls this method when an expression of the form `<%$ RouteValue:urlparameter %>` is encountered in a no-compile page. 此方法将替代方法通过调用方法。This method overrides the method by calling the method. 它获取对象`context`参数，并且它获取表达式、 控件类型和中的属性名称`entry`参数。It gets the object from the `context` parameter, and it gets the expression, the control type, and the property name from the `entry` parameter.

summary.span: 返回一个代码表达式，该表达式用于在生成的页类中为属性赋值。

span.span: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.
An expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeDOM 创建页或控件时，调用此方法。This method is called when the CodeDOM is created for a page or control. 返回对象表示要添加到生成的页类中属性的分配的代码表达式。The object that is returned represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

span.span: If is , if the property of is , or if is empty or , the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索指定的相应值`key`值使用属性`page`。This method retrieves the appropriate value for the specified `key` value by using the property of `page`. 然后，它使用`controlType`和`propertyName`值来查找适当的类型转换器来将检索到的值转换为正确的类型。It then uses the `controlType` and `propertyName` values to find the appropriate type converter in order to convert the retrieved value into the correct type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsEvaluate As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsEvaluate { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可在未编译的页中计算表达式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否方法已在类中实现以便未编译的页中返回表达式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class in order to return a value for the expression in a page that is not compiled. 类可以计算不编译页中的表达式。The class can evaluate an expression in a page that is not compiled. 因此，它始终返回`true`。Therefore, it always returns `true`.
